title: Just one of the boys
creator_credit: Christina Crowley, Association Films and O D N Productions
brief_description:
Episode of Series “Acquaintance Rape”.
Demonstrates the occurrence of sexual assaults between teenage acquaintances through an episode involving a teenage boy whose desire to be accepted as one of the boys call for participation in a gang rape. Points out various factors which contribute to the assault situation, and emphasises the need for young people to undertstand their own sexual values and those of others.
creator_credit_for_label: Christina Crowley, Association Films and O D N Productions
